participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious, thoughtful, and passionate about justice.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Creative, adventurous, and a lover of stories.
participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby. i'm a huge star wars fan.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
tldr: want to be lawyer
